title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog Details
description:
When modifying parameters in the dialog, the following issues have been observed:

- There is a duplicated name validation that could be performed on the first page.
- The first and second columns could be merged.
OB:
- The buttons are too small.
- When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected. However, both move buttons are enabled.
- When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off.
- The dialog comes up huge for methods with many parameters.
EB:
- The marking between the button and the list is too large. The top button should be aligned with the dialog top.
- The table should have a label so it can contain a mnemonic.
- Multiple selection should be allowed, as the move up/down functionality can be applied to more than one item.
- The signature preview must be a label that wraps. It would be nice if the signature preview has the background color set to the same color as a hover.
